name: Scuttling Is Painless
description:
Note

We can’t stress enough how strongly we recommend you use a gamepad. Keyboard controls are very, very clunky, and make the game way harder.

Synopsis

A tight 15 minute Metroidvania inspired platformer where you play as a repair drone working to stop the self-destruction of the Colony Ship’s AI.

All the while, a rolling counter of colonists who have died is kept.

Cheerful!

Features

- "Charge Based" Jumping - Hold down the button to charge, release to jump!

- Difficult Platforming Gauntlets - Lasers, enemies, lasers on enemies, moving platforms - you mention it, we've half implemented it.

- Chiptune Soundtrack - Hastily made in FamiTracker in less time than it took to learn the program!

- 2 Collectible Upgrades - Sprinting and Dashing are unlocked by progressing through the level, and are used to access previously locked areas!

Credits

Created for Ludum Dare 50, "Delay the inevitable",  in 72 sleepless hours.

Arcane Rituals are:
